content:
Dear Sir/Miss,

I am mapping simple patient data to FHIR resource using C# language. I am mapping the patient data directly to objects and then objects serialize to XML. However, it display error message at this line. I would be so thankful if anyone here, could write one line code that serialize the object to XML.

Thanks,
Ayaz

Ayaz - that will be hard to do since we don't know your implementation nor what library you are using. I suggest that you find a more appropriate stream to post to since your request probably isn't an analytics question. I might suggest posting to #implementers would make more sense. And you need to provide way more information to have people help you out.
Actually, if this is a C# question, the #dotnet stream is best. You'll definitely have to provide specific information about the message and what you've done.
